name: StarterForest
description: A quiet forest edge where celestial cycles drive life. Sun and moon oscillate above while creatures and plants dance between survival and growth.

name: Village
description: A farming settlement where fire and ice oscillate in hearths, labor produces bread, and gears grind flour into commerce.

name: BioticFlux
description: The quantum heart of the ecosystem. Sun and moon cycle through wheat and mushroom growth, while matter flows through detritus and death.

name: StellarForges
description: Industrial space. Energy cycles through power and storage while production shifts between active fabrication and raw materials, outputting rockets and saucers.

name: FungalNetworks
description: Networked fungal colonies thrive in moonlight and moisture, spreading through insects and spores, cycling between health and death.

name: VolcanicWorlds
description: Extreme geology. Fire forges stone into crystal while mining and steam shape the environment into glowing vitality.
